g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Our story
g:HTMLPanel.p:
Ziplly, was a product of an unfortunate flat tire, lonely ponderings and a bit of hard work to give life to an unborn idea. One fine Seattle day, I tried to pull my car out of the street in front of our house and noticed I had a flat tire. When I started to fix the flat, I realized
I didn't have the right tools. Fortunately, one of my neighbors noticed me
struggling and stepped in, lending me his time and tools. This got me
wondering how can I get quick help if I were caught in a similar
situation in the future.
Lets say you needed to borrow something such as a ladder or tools to fix
a leek, but you didn’t want to go buy them since you had no storage space
to keep them. Or perhaps you witnessed one of your neighbors cars get hit
and the offender didn’t stop or leave a note. There are many situations
where we could use the help of our neighbors, need to borrow an item we
don’t have, or have information that we should share with other members
of our community. Ziplly is a private and secure community forum dedicated at connecting neighbors to be more neighborly.

Knowing your neighbors is great, but Zipply is even better!. Ziplly knows
that communities thrive on local businesses and we aim to connect
members of the community directly with the stores, restaurants and various
shops with their best customers - the people who live right next door.
Through Ziplly, businesses can share deals and promotions in real time,
gather meaningful feedback from consumers, and truly connect with their
primary customers.

Ziplly is a platform which ties communities together through promoting
communication and raising awareness about local issues that matter.
g:HTMLPanel.g:HTMLPanel:
Contact us Ziplly Inc.
Email: admin@ziplly.com

g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Use of communication services
g:HTMLPanel.p: The Site may contain bulletin board services, chat areas, news groups, forums, communities, personal web pages, calendars, and/or other message or communication facilities designed to enable you to communicate with the public at large or with a group (collectively, "Communication Services"), you agree to use the Communication Services only to post, send and receive messages and material that are proper and related to the particular Communication Service.

By way of example, and not as a limitation, you agree that when using a Communication Service, you will not: defame, abuse, harass, stalk, threaten or otherwise violate the legal rights (such as rights of privacy and publicity) of others; publish, post, upload, distribute or disseminate any inappropriate, profane, defamatory, infringing, obscene, indecent or unlawful topic, name, material or information; upload files that contain software or other material protected by intellectual property laws (or by rights of privacy of publicity) unless you own or control the rights thereto or have received all necessary consents; upload files that contain viruses, corrupted files, or any other similar software or programs that may damage the operation of another's computer; advertise or offer to sell or buy any goods or services for any business purpose, unless such Communication Service specifically allows such messages; conduct or forward surveys, contests, pyramid schemes or chain letters; download any file posted by another user of a Communication Service that you know, or reasonably should know, cannot be legally distributed in such manner; falsify or delete any author attributions, legal or other proper notices or proprietary designations or labels of the origin or source of software or other material contained in a file that is uploaded, restrict or inhibit any other user from using and enjoying the Communication Services; violate any code of conduct or other guidelines which may be applicable for any particular Communication Service; harvest or otherwise collect information about others, including e-mail addresses, without their consent; violate any applicable laws or regulations.

Ziplly has no obligation to monitor the Communication Services. However, Ziplly reserves the right to review materials posted to a Communication Service and to remove any materials in its sole discretion. Ziplly reserves the right to terminate your access to any or all of the Communication Services at any time without notice for any reason whatsoever.

Ziplly reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, or to edit, refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, in Ziplly's sole discretion.

Always use caution when giving out any personally identifying information about yourself or your children in any Communication Service. Ziplly does not control or endorse the content, messages or information found in any Communication Service and, therefore, Ziplly specifically disclaims any liability with regard to the Communication Services and any actions resulting from your participation in any Communication Service. Managers and hosts are not authorized Ziplly spokespersons, and their views do not necessarily reflect those of Ziplly.

Materials uploaded to a Communication Service may be subject to posted limitations on usage, reproduction and/or dissemination. You are responsible for adhering to such limitations if you upload the materials.

Materials provided to http://www.ziplly.com or posted on any Ziplly web page Ziplly does not claim ownership of the materials you provide to http://www.ziplly.com (including feedback and suggestions) or post, upload, input or submit to any Ziplly Site or our associated services (collectively "Submissions"). However, by posting, uploading, inputting, providing or submitting your Submission you are granting Ziplly, our affiliated companies and necessary sublicensees permission to use your Submission in connection with the operation of their Internet businesses including, without limitation, the rights to: copy, distribute, transmit, publicly display, publicly perform, reproduce, edit, translate and reformat your Submission; and to publish your name in connection with your Submission.

g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Privacy Policy
g:HTMLPanel.p: Protecting your private information is our priority. This Statement of Privacy applies to the http://www.ziplly.com and Ziplly Inc. and governs data collection and usage. For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, unless otherwise noted, all references to Ziplly Inc. include http://www.ziplly.com and Ziplly. The Ziplly website is a social networking site. By using the Ziplly website, you consent to the data practices described in this statement.
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Collection of your Personal Information
g:HTMLPanel.p: Ziplly may collect personally identifiable information, such as your name. Ziplly may also collect anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as your gender. We may gather additional personal or non-personal information in the future.

Information about your computer hardware and software may be automatically collected by Ziplly. This information can include: your IP address, browser type, domain names, access times and referring website addresses. This information is used for the operation of the service, to maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the Ziplly website.

Please keep in mind that if you directly disclose personally identifiable information or personally sensitive data through Ziplly's public message boards, this information may be collected and used by others.

Ziplly encourages you to review the privacy statements of websites you choose to link to from Ziplly so that you can understand how those websites collect, use and share your information. Ziplly is not responsible for the privacy statements or other content on websites outside of the Ziplly website.
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Use of your Personal Information
g:HTMLPanel.p: Ziplly collects and uses your personal information to operate its website(s) and deliver the services you have requested.

Ziplly may also use your personally identifiable information to inform you of other products or services available from Ziplly and its affiliates. Ziplly may also contact you via surveys to conduct research about your opinion of current services or of potential new services that may be offered.
Ziplly does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties.

Ziplly may share data with trusted partners to help perform statistical analysis, send you email or postal mail, provide customer support, or arrange for deliveries. All such third parties are prohibited from using your personal information except to provide these services to Ziplly, and they are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.

Ziplly will disclose your personal information, without notice, only if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to the edicts of the law or comply with legal process served on Ziplly or the site; (b) protect and defend the rights or property of Ziplly; and, (c) act under exigent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of Ziplly, or the public.
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Use of Cookies
g:HTMLPanel.p: The Ziplly website may use "cookies" to help you personalize your online experience. A cookie is a text file that is placed on your hard disk by a web page server. Cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer. Cookies are uniquely assigned to you, and can only be read by a web server in the domain that issued the cookie to you.

One of the primary purposes of cookies is to provide a convenience feature to save you time. The purpose of a cookie is to tell the Web server that you have returned to a specific page. For example, if you personalize Ziplly pages, or register with Ziplly site or services, a cookie helps Ziplly to recall your specific information on subsequent visits. This simplifies the process of recording your personal information, such as billing addresses, shipping addresses, and so on. When you return to the same Ziplly website, the information you previously provided can be retrieved, so you can easily use the Ziplly features that you customized.

You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most Web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to fully experience the interactive features of the Ziplly services or websites you visit.
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Security of your Personal Information
g:HTMLPanel.p: Ziplly secures your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure.

Children Under Thirteen Ziplly does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under the age of thirteen. If you are under the age of thirteen, you must ask your parent or guardian for permission to use this website.

Opt-Out Unsubscribe We respect your privacy and give you an opportunity to opt-out of receiving announcements of certain information. Users may opt-out of receiving any or all communications from Ziplly by contacting us here: - Web page: www.ziplly.com - Email: admin@ziplly.com - Phone: 918-850-7778
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Changes to this Statement
g:HTMLPanel.p: Ziplly will occasionally update this Statement of Privacy to reflect company and customer feedback. Ziplly encourages you to periodically review this Statement to be informed of how Ziplly is protecting your information.
g:HTMLPanel.b:Heading: Contact Information
g:HTMLPanel.p: Ziplly welcomes your questions or comments regarding this Statement of Privacy. If you believe that Ziplly has not adhered to this Statement, please contact Ziplly at:
